Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractFeatureExtractor, AbstractVoiceActivityDetector, AudioContinuityTester, AudioFileDataSource, BatchAGC, BatchCMN, BatchVarNorm, DataBlocker, DataBufferProcessor, DataConverter, DataDumper, DiscreteCosineTransform, DiscreteFourierTransform, Dither, EnergyFilter, ExcessiveNonSpeechPruner, FeatureTransform, FrameDropper, FrontEnd, FrontEndSplitter, GainControlProcessor, LiveCMN, MelFrequencyFilterBank, Microphone, NonSpeechDataFilter, PLPCepstrumProducer, PLPFrequencyFilterBank, Preemphasizer, RaisedCosineWindower, SpeechMarker, StreamCepstrumSource, StreamDataSource, StreamHTKCepstrum, VUMeterMonitor, WavWriter, WienerFilter
public abstract class BaseDataProcessor
extends ConfigurableAdapter
implements DataProcessor

An abstract DataProcessor implementing elements common to all concrete DataProcessors, such as name, predecessor, and timer.
